item.description:
I enjoyed the tour we had last year and have used up the goodies I bought.  Some people wanted to go again, some wanted to attend their festival (which was the next weekend, bad timing), and some didn't get a chance.  So at Caryl's suggestion I am taking the lead to have a proper meetup to attend the festival.

 

http://www.sweetwindfarm.net/Events___Classes.html

Some details about the event from the above website:  "Featuring maple syrup and sugar making demonstrations, narrated slide show, video, storytime for kids, sugarhouse tours, cooking and recipe class, food, free syrup samples, tree tapping demonstration, sugar-on-snow, and more! Learn how maple syrup and sugar is made at our farm. Various maple products will be for sale. Free admission."  More info will be on the website in early March.

 

It starts at 10:00am if you want to be there early.  Because of my morning obligations I will probably arrive around noon.  If you want to carpool - always better when going to places that have limited parking - we can meet in West Hartford at 11:15am.  This is the day after the March meetup so if needed we can finalize details there.
item.why: We talked about doing this last year, but the scheduling didn't work.
item.name: 5th Annual Maple Festival @ Sweet Wind Farm
